sub_topic: Moduli spaces of algebraic curves and their properties
message_1:
Let $X$ be a smooth projective curve of genus $g$ and $M_g$ be the moduli space of (isomorphism classes of) curves of genus $g$.

If $g=5$, what is the dimension of $M_5$?
message_2:
The dimension of the moduli space $M_g$ of smooth projective curves of genus $g$ can be computed using the formula:

dim($M_g$) = 3g - 3

In this case, we have $g = 5$, so the dimension of $M_5$ is:

dim($M_5$) = 3(5) - 3 = 15 - 3 = 12

Thus, the dimension of $M_5$ is 12.
